body.p: 1. KJV spelling of Reuel, an alternate name for Jethro, Mosesâ€™ father-in-law, in Numbers 10:29. See Jethro.
2. A member of the tribe of Naphtali living in Ecbatana who, according to Tobit 3:7, was the father of Sarah, soon to become the wife of Tobias, thanks to the intervention of the angel Raphael.
